wikitext.*:
[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Field of Celebrant.jpg|thumb|250px|Field of Celebrant in ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']]
The '''Field of Celebrant''' lay between the Rivers [[Anduin]] and [[Limlight]], to the southeast of [[Lothlórien]].<ref>{{FR|Map}}</ref>  

In {{TA|2510}}<ref>{{App|TA}}</ref> this was the site of the decisive [[Battle of the Field of Celebrant]], at which [[Eorl]] the Young rode from the north to the aid of [[Gondor]].<ref>{{UT|Cirion}}</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2013: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:The Field of Celebrant is a landmark in the "Parth Celebrant" area.
